name: Web-on Digital
tagline: We make your company have presence on the Internet
description:
Web-On Digital is a web development company located in Costa Rica. Our staff has great skills in web development, digital marketing, search engine positioning and social network management.
Among our technical skills we have HTML5, CSS3, PHP, MySQL, SEO, responsive design and usability. We also manage content managers (CMS) such as Drupal, Joomla and Wordpress, as well as Magento and Shopify for e-commerce platforms
